ygData.subject: Night at befallen
ygData.msgSnippet: I was going on a raid of befallen with 2 friends (I am a 21 druid, and I had a 22 wizzerdriss and a 20 rougess) As we entered this dungon we went to meet our
ygData.messageBody:
I was going on a raid of befallen with 2 friends
(I am a 21 druid, and I had a 22 wizzerdriss and a
20 rougess) As we entered this dungon we went to
meet our first oppent The dark elf Shadow Knight, He
hit me with his magic shot which droped me down to
9/10 health but a quick BS and Careless Lighting
finished him with ease. In luck he droped they key! We
made our way to the second floor and headed to the
Human Shadow Knight, we got the jump on her But a skele
decided to help, so as Wyly (rouge) was battling the SK,
me and Mylissa(wizard) finished the Skele with
little trouble. Wyly got 2 bs in while the Sk was slowly
being eaten away by my swarm. We then proceded to go to
see the Ugly Orge SK, not sure of the contents of
this room I put up a Shield of Barbs on all of us, we
entered, Wyly got hit hard for about 1/5 health, Then the
sk came over after a rather short time we dispatced
them with little ease, we check the orges corpse and
boom, Barbed arms, I'm sure someone in the guild could
use these.... So we progress into the lower depths as
we beat ghoul after Willowisp, we get hit with the
worst thing that could happen in eq we all went LD at
once! we come back dead!<br>Remind me why I don't kill
GM's?
